item.title: Deployment and Securing of a LAMP Stack
Securing an Apache Server with SELinux
item.description: In this report, the importance of the security of a webserver is discussed on modern deployments, as part of this, implementations demonstrating ways of securing a Apache webserver hosted on CentOS are shown with suitable explanation *Keywords— Apache, SELinux, Web Hosting, Webserver, Server Security, CentOS; * 1. Introduction Apache is one of the most popular web servers currently being used across the internet, with 32.2% of all outward-facing web servers being hosted using Apache [1].
